name: Goblin Ambush
description: Goblins leap from bushes demanding toll

name: Trapped Hallway
environmental_hazards: Pressure plates trigger poison darts (DC 15 Dex save, 2d6 poison damage)
description: Long corridor with suspicious floor tiles

name: Bandit Negotiation
description: Bandits blocking the road; may negotiate or fight

name: Collapsing Bridge
environmental_hazards: Bridge unstable (DC 12 Acrobatics or fall 30ft into rapids)
description: Ancient bridge creaks ominously as trolls defend it
